description:
The Twelve Six Carbon is a natural choice for paddlers who demand the best in performance but want all the benefits of an inflatable SUP. Carbon stringers on the deck, hull and sidewall with reinforced edge taping results in a super stiff ride comparable to an expensive epoxy board. With a leash, paddle and pump, it comes with everything you need to hit the water.

  • Mono-Layer fusion laminated drop needle construction is lightweight and rigid
  • Carbon rails and stringers with reinforced edge taping for ultralight durability
  • Deflates to a storable size that fits in a closet or the back of your car
  • Deck bungee cord secures personal items or yoga gear
  • Soft deck is grippy in kneeling or standing position
  • Grab handle make it easy to carry up from the water
  • 3-piece carbon paddle is light and strong
  • Removable carbon cruising fin is tool-free
  • Included: paddle, leash, Bravo Super 2-way pump, carrying case, and repair kit
  • Max PSI is 20
name: Level Six Twelve Six Carbon Inflatable SUP Package - Unisex
